alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 7:37AM EST until February 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and northwest New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
